sentence: This comes after Florida Republican Governor Ron DeSantis signed the so-called "Don't Say Gay" bill into law in March.
author: Gerrard Kaonga
title: Florida Teacher Fired for Discussing Sexual Orientation Sparks Debate

sentence: In January, Florida Governor and top Trump ally Ron DeSantis released a political ad in which he suggested Fauci should "pound sand" over the apparent contradictory advice Fauci offered throughout the pandemic.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Fauci's Refusal To Work With Trump Again Delights MAGA Supporters
